anthony blinken

the ones that affect the lives of our

uh precisely because of these mutations

is that we get full transparency full

that we can prevent the next one from

the way we prevent it uh from being

uh both to lengthen and strengthen the

uh that need to be addressed and uh what

we intend to be there that if it happens

um there are no uh no upfront

the problem has gotten worse iran is now

that so-called breakout time had been

by the nuclear agreement it's now down

uh to just a few months and meanwhile

not standing down but acting up uh in uh

attacks on our own forces uh in iraq

as you know all of the sanctions remain

in fact our leverage has now increased

on the same page with our european

they were spending most of their energy

uh not in exerting pressure on iran for

having
having said that look i think the
